advantages: Critically hitting an enemy will apply the  Armor-Piercing status effect to them for 5 seconds.

Jamming Shells.name: Jamming Shells
advantages: Hitting an enemy applies the  Jammer status effect to them for 9 seconds.

«Death Herald» compulsator.name: «Death Herald» compulsator
advantages: Destroying an enemy fully reloads the turret

Camper.name: Camper
disadvantages: Damage boost is active only while you have at least 95% of your maximum HP.
Effect is disabled when the tank has the  Freezing status effect.

Detonator.name: Detonator
advantages: Max. area damage radius of the grenade: +100%
Avg. area damage radius of the grenade: +100%
Min. area damage radius of the grenade: +30%

Pulsar.name: Pulsar
advantages:
Hitting an enemy with a critical shot will apply the following status effects:
 Jammer: 9 sec
 Electromagnetic Pulse: 2 sec
 Stun: 1 sec
 Armor-Piercing: 5 sec

Engineer.name: Engineer
advantages: Picking up a supply box adds 1000 HP

Heat Immunity.name: Heat Immunity
disadvantages: Vulcan's Incendiary band augment can't inflict the burning status effect.

EMP Immunity.name: EMP Immunity
advantages: Provides complete immunity from the  Electromagnetic Pulse status effect.

Stun Immunity.name: Stun Immunity
advantages: Provides complete immunity from the  Stun status effect.

AP Immunity.name: AP Immunity
advantages: Provides complete immunity from the  Armor-Piercing status effect.

Jammer Immunity.name: Jammer Immunity
advantages: Provides complete immunity from the  Jammer status effect. The wearer will be able to activate their overdrive and will have full use of their drone.

Blaster.name: Blaster
advantages: Light hulls deal a maximum of 750-1500 chaos damage upon death to enemies nearby
Medium hulls deal a maximum of 1125-2250  chaos damage upon death to enemies nearby

Heavy hulls deal maximum 1500-3000chaos damage upon death to enemies nearby
Radius of maximum splash damage: 3m
Radius of average splash damage: 4m
Radius of minimum splash damage: 15m
Average and minimum splash damage: 50%

Lifeguard.name: Lifeguard
advantages:
Protects the tank from destruction once per respawn
Health  recovered: 500 HP

Miner.name: Miner
advantages: 70% of placed mines survive after the death of the tank. The surviving mines are chosen randomly.

Phoenix.name: Phoenix
advantages:
Provides immunity from negative effects:
 Jammer
 Electromagnetic Pulse
 Stun
 Armor-Piercing
disadvantages: Overdrive does not charge passively over time

Special Protection.name: Special Protection
advantages:
Provides immunity from negative effects:
 Jammer
 Electromagnetic Pulse
 Stun
 Armor-Piercing
 Burning
 Freezing
